trans-unit.source: Specifies the ID of a project item type that is being defined, or the ID of a project item type that is being extended.
trans-unit.target: 指定正在定义的项目项类型的 ID 或正在扩展的项目项类型的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Apply this attribute to implementations of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemTypeProvider> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemTypeExtension> interfaces in extensions of the SharePoint project system.
trans-unit.target: 将此特性应用于的实现<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemTypeProvider>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemTypeExtension>扩展 SharePoint 项目系统中的接口。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Define a SharePoint Project Item Type](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-define-a-sharepoint-project-item-type.md) and [How to: Create a SharePoint Project Item Extension](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-project-item-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 定义 SharePoint 项目项类型](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-define-a-sharepoint-project-item-type.md)和[如何： 创建 SharePoint 项目项扩展](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-project-item-extension.md)。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the project item type being defined or extended.
trans-unit.target: 正在定义或扩展的项目项类型的 ID。

trans-unit.source: This is typically a namespace-qualified name to avoid collisions of type IDs between different vendors.
trans-unit.target: 这通常是命名空间限定的名称，以避免不同供应商之间类型 ID 的冲突。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointProjectItemTypeAttribute" /> class with the project item type ID.
trans-unit.target: 使用项目项类型 ID 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointProjectItemTypeAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the project item type ID that is being defined or extended.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置正在定义或扩展的项目项类型 ID。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a project item type ID.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示项目项类型 id。
